== Re-Approval Application for Catalan LoCo Team (ubuntu-cat) ==
 
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="float:left; width:105px; margin: 0 0 0em 0em; "style="padding:0.5em; "><nowiki>[[File:ubuntucat_deg.png]]</nowiki>
|}

The Ubuntu Catalan LoCo Team is a very active group of people that supports and spreads Ubuntu amongst the Catalan speaking community. It is the most important resource of information about Ubuntu in this language. We are a very heterogeneous and varied group of people focused on spreading the free software philosophy, specially Ubuntu. We are in a continuous improving process, and have several projects in mind that will be done by our different workgroups in the near (or not-so-near) future.

==== Mailing Lists ====

We have two different mailing lists:

* <nowiki>[[http://llistes.cpl.upc.edu/pipermail/ubuntucat-equip/|equip]]</nowiki> (team): this one is an, open to everybody, organizational purpose list, to help the team manage the daily tasks without messing in the info list.
* <nowiki>[[http://llistes.cpl.upc.edu/pipermail/ubuntucat-info/|info]]</nowiki> (technical help): as the description states, is where people ask for help with their Ubuntu problems.

==== Forum ====

<nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/forumdisplay.php?f=206|cat.ubuntuforums.org]]</nowiki>

  With 2959 threads so far.

==== Planet ====

* High activity planet with 4 weekly news and 24 blogging sources.

 <nowiki>[[http://planeta.ubuntu.cat]]</nowiki>

* Not so high activity planet, youth ubuntaires, 13 blogging sources.

 <nowiki>[[http://joves.ubuntu.cat/planeta/]]</nowiki>

==== Web ====

* New Drupal-based website: http://www.ubuntu.cat 
* Main communication channel with the community.
* Map with the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.cat/mapa_ubuntaires|community members location]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.cat/mapa_activitats|another one]]</nowiki> with the events locations, linking to its information.
* Points to forum, mailing lists, irc channel and wiki, to allow new people to know just one only reference point for all the Loco resources.
 
==== ajuda.ubuntu.cat ====

* Catalan translation of the help.ubuntu.com site from version 8.10 upwards. Not completed, but improving.

==== IRC Channel ====

 Logs from the IRC channel are in <nowiki>[[http://logs.ubuntu-eu.org/freenode/]]</nowiki>.

==== Fornightly Meetings ====

* IRC : We have an online meeting the 1^st^ and 16^th^ of every month at 22:00h (local time) where we talk about our current projects and Team status. We maintain a wiki copy of all our <nowiki>[[CatalanTeam-IRC-Logs|meeting's logs]]</nowiki> for easy reading and consulting.

 
=== Catalan Remix ISOs ===

Every release we present a set of ISOs including Catalan as default language complete with all language packages.

 <nowiki>[[ftp:--ftp.caliu.cat-pub-distribucions-ubuntu-cat-]]</nowiki>

 <nowiki>[[http://ftp.caliu.cat/pub/distribucions/ubuntu-cat/]]</nowiki>
